txt.en: You have encountered the threatening Marzgurúd. From command by powers in Udûn, Marzgurúd patrols The Wastes for intruders.
Marzgurúd can be found patrolling The Wastes.\n\nYou have encountered Marzgurúd and should defeat the beast for those who brave these harsh lands.
From command by powers in Udûn, Marzgurúd patrols The Wastes for intruders.
Marzgurúd can be found patrolling The Wastes.\n\nYou have encountered Marzgurúd and should defeat the beast for those who brave these harsh lands.
You have slain Marzgurúd and vanquished a threat to the safety of all those who brave The Wastes.
